name: Number Block Puzzle.
description:
“Number Block Puzzle” is an addictive relaxing jigsaw puzzle game. Come to play Number Puzzle Daily and give your brain a rest!


How to play NUMBER BLOCK PUZZLE?
⁃ Drag or tap the number blocks to move them.
⁃ Use the empty space to place the tiles in order.

WHY CHOOSE THIS NUMBER BLOCK PUZZLE GAME？

⁃ Beautifully easy and simple, no pressure and no time limit.
⁃ Challenging to break your highest score.
⁃ Easy to play. Classic brick game and number game for all ages!
⁃ Multiple beautiful background pictures.
⁃ Multiple materials of blocks. Such as: wood, candy, jewel, gems…
⁃ Classic 'block puzzle' and 'number puzzle' game.

Come and play this game and become a master of puzzle game now!
